name: Switcher (itch) (Juan Rodrigues)
description:
History

Switcher is a little witcher ( xD ) in the form of a sphere. The first and only power Switcher learned was to consume the souls of others, allowing him to inherit their powers and appearance.
The day has come for Switcher to acquire his Mage Degree and become a "Dark Mage".
In order to accomplish this, Switcher has to find his way out of a mysterious tower. His plan is to enlist the help of the creatures inside, in exchange for freeing their souls.

Mechanics

Top-down (Or Rpg) view puzzle game.
Players must use the monsters ability to collect the Crystal and find a way out.
Controls

Movement: WASD
Interact: Q
Use ability : Left Mouse Button
